mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BUDGET_BILL(BUDGET_BILL_NUM, BUDGET_BILL_PRICE_SUM, BUDGET_BILL_LABOR_RATIO, BUDGET_BILL_LABOR_PRICE, BUDGET_BILL_GOODS_PRICE, BUDGET_BILL_DATE, GWAN_RI_NUM)
VALUES(BUDGET_BILL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{budget_bill_price_sum}, #{budget_bill_labor_ratio}, #{budget_bill_labor_price}, #{budget_bill_goods_price}, #{budget_bill_date}, #{gwan_ri_num} )
